mapper.insert: insert into board_table (boardWriter, boardPass, boardTitle, boardContents, fileAttached) values (#{boardWriter}, #{boardPass}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, #{fileAttached})
mapper.select: select * from board_table order by boardCreatedDate desc;
mapper.update: update board_table set boardHits=boardHits+1 where id=#{id}
update board_table set boardTitle=#{boardTitle}, boardContents=#{boardContents} where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into board_file_table(originalFileName, storedFileName, boardId) values (#{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{boardId})
mapper.select: select * from board_table order by id desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
